pages.title: CMY Variant
pages.text: Upgrade your $(l:general/pedestal)Pigment Pedestal$() by using all the shards you collected on your journey.
$(br2)To make use of the $(l:general/pedestal)Pigment Pedestals$() advanced abilities you will need a structure to focus gemstone energy into it.$(br2)You call it the Spectrum Focus.

pages.name: Spectrum Focus
pages.text: You can switch the basalt blocks with calcite and choose the gemstone blocks as you like it best.

pages.title: Individualize!
pages.text: Mix them up to create your personal variation!
